sourceDesc.p: ATL MS-Copy-Micro-0485-1; Undated: but content places it at 1 October 1888.

front.p: 1888? to HardingATL MS-Copy-Micro-0485-1; Undated: but content places it at 1 October 1888.

body.p: I hope to be able to go to town tomorrow, & if possible to give you a call—but of this I am not sure. I have been very unwell for 3 days, only just able to sit up & scrawl. I have recd. 2 copies of N.Z. Herald which gives 2 columns of quotn. from our book (early portion) with scarcely any remark. I purpose writing a note this aftn. to Dinwiddie, re his sticking advt. (so early, too!) in 1st. page.—
Hoping you & yours are all well. I am, yrs truly
